quotes.text: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
quotes.author: Princess Leia

quotes.text: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
quotes.author: Darth Vader

quotes.text: The Force will be with you. Always.
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: Never tell me the odds!
quotes.author: Han Solo

quotes.text: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.text: No. I am your father.
quotes.author: Darth Vader

quotes.text: I am a Jedi, like my father before me.
quotes.author: Luke Skywalker

quotes.text: There’s always a bigger fish.
quotes.author: Qui-Gon Jinn

quotes.text: You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting.
quotes.author: Shmi Skywalker

quotes.text: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger; anger leads to hate; hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.text: I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.
quotes.author: Jango Fett

quotes.text: What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith?
quotes.author: Count Dooku

quotes.text: The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural.
quotes.author: Chancellor Palpatine

quotes.text: Power! Unlimited power!
quotes.author: Darth Sidious

quotes.text: You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you.
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: Chewie, we’re home.
quotes.author: Han Solo

quotes.text: I am one with the Force. The Force is with me.
quotes.author: Chirrut Îmwe

quotes.text: Jyn, I’ll be there for you. Cassian said I had to.
quotes.author: K-2SO

quotes.text: In my experience there is no such thing as luck.
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: I’ve got a bad feeling about this.
It’s a trap!
quotes.author: Admiral Ackbar

quotes.text: Mind tricks don’t work on me.
quotes.author: Watto

quotes.text: Laugh it up, fuzzball.
quotes.author: Han Solo

quotes.text: If you only knew the power of the dark side.
quotes.author: Darth Vader

quotes.text: Be careful not to choke on your aspirations.
quotes.author: Darth Vader

quotes.text: Who’s the more foolish: the fool, or the fool who follows him?
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: Why do I get the feeling you’re going to be the death of me?
quotes.author: Obi-Wan, to Anakin

quotes.text: Strike me down in anger and I’ll always be with you, just like your father.
quotes.author: Luke Skywalker

quotes.text: If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: Obi-Wan Kenobi? Obi-Wan... Now, that's a name I haven't heard in a long time... A long time.
quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

quotes.text: We’re doomed.
quotes.author: C-3PO

quotes.text: Rebellions are built on hope.
quotes.author: Jyn Erso

quotes.text: Some day you’re gonna be wrong, I just hope I’m there to see it.
quotes.author: Princess Leia

quotes.text: Someday I will be the most powerful Jedi ever.
quotes.author: Anakin Skywalker

quotes.text: People keep telling me they know me. No one does.
quotes.author: Rey

quotes.text: Let the past die. Kill it.
quotes.author: Kylo Ren

quotes.text: I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it.
quotes.author: Kylo Ren

quotes.text: There has been an awakening. Have you felt it?
quotes.author: Supreme Leader Snoke

quotes.text: I’ve Never Had The Luxury Of Political Opinions.
quotes.author: Jyn Erso

quotes.text: Trust Goes Both Ways.
quotes.author: Jyn Erso

quotes.text: Orders? When You Know They’re Wrong? You Might As Well Be A Stormtrooper.
quotes.author: Jyn Erso

quotes.text: Hello there!
quotes.author: General Kenobi

quotes.text: General Kenobi! You are a bold one.
quotes.author: General Grievous

quotes.text: You fool. I've been trained in your Jedi arts by Count Dooku.
quotes.author: General Grievous

quotes.text: More.
quotes.author: Kylo Ren

quotes.text: That's not how the Force works!
quotes.author: Han Solo

quotes.text: Meesa Jar-Jar Binks!
quotes.author: Jar-Jar Binks
